positive_examples: This is an example of missile production facility.
The missile production facility demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed missile production facility in this context.
A typical case of missile production facility would involve these features.
The concept of missile production facility applies here.
A facility dedicated to the manufacturing of ballistic missiles and delivery systems for WMD payloads.
negative_examples: This is an example of nuclear weapon production facility, not missile production facility.
This represents w m d weapons production facility in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: NuclearWeaponProductionFacility, or other types of WMDWeaponsProductionFacility

definition: A facility manufacturing missiles and their components.
